subject: Hockey, Ice
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Henrik Lundqvist, three times named the top goalie in his native Sweden, has made himself a leading candidate for the same honor in the N.H.L. with the Rangers.
snippet: Henrik Lundqvist, three times named the top goalie in his native Sweden, has made himself a leading candidate for the same honor in the N.H.L. with the Rangers.
